show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
A first in history! Listen to two very experienced psychiatrists spend a whole hour talking about how dangerous it is to take psychiatric drugs and how hazardous it can be to withdraw from them.
My guest is psychiatrist Stuart Shipko, MD from Pasadena, California.
My wife Ginger calls this show “spectacular.”
